body: Ujjwal Acharya at The Radiant Star reports that "Equal Access Nepal, an INGO working mainly in media development, is in a process of creating MeroReport.net with an aim of making it a network for citizen journalists in Nepal".
original_body: Ujjwal Acharya at The Radiant Star reports that "Equal Access Nepal, an INGO working mainly in media development, is in a process of creating MeroReport.net with an aim of making it a network for citizen journalists in Nepal".
title: Nepal: Networking Citizen Journalists
